<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deceptive Worship](/Feats.aspx?ID=6471) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=615" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 229 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)

</column>

---

Members of your cult frequently pass themselves off as worshippers of other religions. You can use Occultism instead of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) to [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=2388) a typical worshipper of another faith or to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=2389) specifically to claim you are a member of the faith you are Impersonating. You still need to use the Deception skill to Impersonate a specific worshipper or to perform other deceptive actions, such as attempting to Lie about any other matter.
name: Deceptive Worship
